src.java.org.codehaus.grails.portlets
Class GrailsPortletHandlerInterceptor

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.web.portlet.handler.HandlerInterceptorAdapter
      src.java.org.codehaus.grails.portlets.GrailsPortletHandlerInterceptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware
class GrailsPortletHandlerInterceptor
extends org.springframework.web.portlet.handler.HandlerInterceptorAdapter

This class is needed to modify the request/set context holders after DispatcherPortlet has done it's thing. Otherwise this code could go in the GrailsDispatcherServlet

author:
Lee Butts
